snippet: Pakistan released eight members of the Afghan Taliban from prison on Monday in a bid to aid the peace process in neighboring Afghanistan.
abstract: Pakistan releases eight members of the Afghan Taliban from prison, in a bid to aid peace process in neighboring Afghanistan as foreign troops continue plans to depart in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Pakistan released eight members of the Afghan Taliban from prison on Monday in a bid to aid the peace process in neighboring Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Members of Afghan Taliban Are Freed From Pakistan Prison
headline.main: Pakistan: 8 Members of Afghan Taliban Are Freed From Prison in Peace Gesture
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: 8 Members of Afghan Taliban Are Freed From Prison in Peace Gesture
